We launched today the "National Innovation Strategy" with 30 national implementation initiatives in 3 years .. http://t.co/fyrPtRAo0K
The strategy focuses on seven sectors: Energy, Transport, Health, Education, Technology, Water and Space, the most innovative and globally desired Arab Emirates
The country's investments in innovation amount to 14 billion dirhams a year, of which 7 billion are in research and development. The goal is to increase them significantly in the coming years
The innovation strategy will require all government agencies to cut their expenses by 1% and turn them to support innovation projects and research .. Innovation is the key to excellence

We will build incubators for innovation, specialized educational programs in our schools and universities, and build global partnerships with the best institutes and centers in the field of innovation.

We will put in place legislation to stimulate the private sector to innovate, develop national capacities in science and mathematics, and establish a national culture that encourages youth entrepreneurship and reward.
Innovation today is an institutional work, national policies, specialized cadres, and a community whose sectors are working to explore new and different ways of doing business

The development of our economy, the consolidation of our position, and the building of opportunities for our generations will be the force of reason, the path of paths that others have not followed, and the creation of ways that have not been tried before us in all sectors.

Today we launched a National Innovation Strategy including 30 priority initiatives over three years. http://t.co/NVLYHuMeIV
The first years of the child's age are the foundation for building a healthy and educated generation, happy to open the new ad ...
The UAE is already the most innovative Arab nation. We want to be among the most innovative nations in the world.
The strategy focuses on 7 sectors: renewable energy, transport, education, health, technology, water and space.
The UAE invests AED 14 bln each year in innovation, AED 7 bln of which is spent on R & D. We will raise this target significantly.
The Innovation Strategy requires all government agencies to cut spending by 1% and dedicate the savings to research and innovation.
We will build innovation incubators, school and university programs, and global partnerships with the best innovation centers
It is by using the power of the mind and following innovative approaches that we bring about progress for our country and people.

We have adopted the Education Strategy in the UAE until 2021, which will focus on establishing an educational culture focused on innovation http://t.co/59OcL876fj
We want to graduate national cadres with the skills and tools necessary to contribute to the development process .. And participate in building the knowledge economy ..

Achieving our ambitions in the education sector is linked to an interactive and positive national field of education, driven by the spirit of innovation, enabling the tools of the times, persevering in research and development

Our confidence in the educational field and in our cadres based on education, and our appreciation for each teacher and teacher is a national duty, and they know their role in building the renaissance of the UAE
